metadata.name: Acetaminophen Caffeine and Dihydrocodeine Bitartrate 80 mg Cream

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Chlorphentermine is a relatively weak stimulant with little abuse potential It presents a prominent serotonergic profile leading to pulmonary hypertension and cardiac fibrosis after prolonged use Thus this drug is no longer used
